dt: {bc}to position the body so that one or both {a_link|knees} rest on the floor
{bc}to fall or rest on the knees

dt.t: She {wi}kneeled{/wi} on the floor next to the child.

et: Middle English {it}knelen{/it}, from Old English {it}cnēowlian{/it}; akin to Old English {it}cnēow{/it} knee
shortdef: to position the body so that one or both knees rest on the floor : to fall or rest on the knees
